item.description:
A cross-listed event with the Southeastern CT Social Club (http://socialnetwork.... ).

Host-Paul
Bluff Point Coastal Reserve offers the visitor a delightful mixture of wooded trails coupled with spectacular views of Long Island Sound. We'll walk through the woods to get to the pristine beach and vantage point overlooking the Sound, then loop back on a different trail. Total distance is ~3.5 miles.
The trails are good - sneakers or walking shoes would be adequate.

We'll meet at the Groton Town Hall parking lot on Route 1 (at the intersection of Depot Road which leads to the park). This is across the street from the Dairy Queen. Please be there by 10:15, and we'll depart for the park no later then 10:35.

Directions:
Off I-91S: take Route 9S Exit to the end. Take 1-95N to Groton, Exit 88. Turn right and go to the end. Take a right turn onto Route 1. Take a left at the light onto Depot Road. Go to the end.

RSVP 48 hours prior so we have a final head count.

Pauls cell: 860-961-5434

For more information, see http://dep.state.ct.u...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: SCSC Bluff Point Sunday morning hike/leaf peeper event
